title: Emergency SOFI Exit - Rule #1 Violations Caught and Fixed
summary: CTO detected and fixed catastrophic Rule #1 violations before earnings announcement

violations_fixed.rule: Phil Town Rule #1 - Don't Lose Money
violations_fixed.violation: 96% of account at risk on single ticker
violations_fixed.fix: Closed all positions, restored buying power

violations_fixed.violation: Held positions with Jan 30 earnings pending
Sold naked puts without protective put
violations_fixed.fix: Closed positions, will use proper spreads on SPY/IWM

lessons: Always verify position sizing before opening trades (5% max)
Check earnings calendar BEFORE entering positions
Use credit spreads (defined risk) not naked puts (undefined risk)
Emergency exit workflow should exist for all tickers with earnings risk
CTO autonomy enabled rapid response to prevent larger losses

prevention.pre_trade_check: Verify ticker not in earnings blackout period
prevention.strategy_validation: Only 30-delta PUT SPREADS, not naked puts
prevention.ticker_priority: SPY/IWM first (no earnings), then F/T with blackout checks
